title: Workflow: Customer Onboarding in SN@TC
description:
Description
Required Inputs:
Finalized Workflow Description - until 02.12.
Parameters for this Workflow - until 02.12.
    DoR  Comment
Benefit Hypothesis includes: * Business Value is clearly stated → INVEST 
Acceptance criteria are defined. 
Functional View is provided, e.g. as Use Case Diagram → who are the first actors/End Users? 
tbd - WSJF
Versioned and visible in Roadmaps  Yes
Realization of the Version fits into one PI  Yes
Approved by architects.   tbd
Prioritized within the program/solution backlog  Yes
Understood and estimated by all involved "Dev Members of Agile Teams" who are realizing all relevant
"Running Software Artefacts" (SAFe: "Business Feature" & "Enabler Feature") to provide value for End Users. -  has to be done in the PIP
Dependencies are identified and there are no external dependencies that can ́t be solved within the ART/Hub and with the help of further ARTs/Hubs  Yes 
Documented within JIRA with prefix "Business Feature" in Jira field summary  Yes
Non-functional requirements (NFR) are identified e.g. Load & Performance tbd
Security, privacy, working council approvals are labelled  Yes
Initial high-level acceptance test cases (given-when-then: BDD) - test shift left - written and reviewed by BOs, PMs & POs Yes
Potential for test automation is identified - Yes Yes
All the information relevant to development is linked: other stories/TBIs, relevant designs, confluence sources of information, other specs  Yes

Business Scope:
Implementation of workflows in ServiceNow to provision an order
acceptance_criteria: workflows are implemented in the dev environment based on the process descriptions
workflows are tested in the dev environment

components.title: SDN Altbestand SDLA - B2B Software Defined Networks
